title: What are the limitations of the code of ethics? - Quora

response.answer_text: A Code of Ethics is just a guide to professional behavior designed to keep members of the profession out of trouble. A person can follow the letter of the Code of Ethics without actually having any intention of doing right, or acting in a moral manner. There’s an old Irish saying, “You can’t always count on an ally to be a friend, but you can always count on a friend to be an ally.” In the same way, you can’t always count on a strictly ethical person being a moral person, but you can always count on a moral person being an ethical person.
